attributes.action: abolish the so-called National Institute for Clinical Excellence and let decisions on health funding be made by medical staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am appalled by all the reports of refusals by not-so-NICE to fund life-saving drugs, etc., the latest being one for kidney cancer.  I have read that doctors are reluctant to discuss life-extending treatments with patients because - disgracefully - it can take up to three years for medication to be approved by N.I.C.E!  I have yet to see ANY reports of any BENEFICIAL effects of this Institute so what's the point of it?  Why not spend whatever it costs on treating seriously-ill patients?
